TargetName: OBJ-002: Maximize Project Delivery Plan score

Statement: Construction methodology must align with proposed site layout building configuration and special technical requirements from DEL-02-01 before narrative can be finalized.
SourceRef: Specification.md > R-09 Coordination with Design Concept
EvidenceQuote: Construction methodology cannot be finalized without knowing the design concept. Methodology must demonstrate that the proposed concept is buildable.
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources state explicit information dependency: site layout / building configuration / structural system / special technical requirements (16 ft doors/sumps/exhaust/generator/fill stations/solar roof) required from DEL-02-01 before methodology can be completed. See also Procedure.md Step 3 and Datasheet.md Cross-Deliverable Coordination.

Statement: Construction methodology durations milestones and critical path must align with project schedule from DEL-08-01; narrative cannot be finalized until schedule is available for cross-check.
SourceRef: Specification.md > R-10 Coordination with Project Schedule
EvidenceQuote: Construction methodology describes how work will be executed; the schedule describes when and duration. Methodology must be feasible within the proposed schedule.
Notes: FACT. Specification R-10 and Procedure.md Step 3 explicitly state coordination gate requiring schedule durations/milestones/critical path from DEL-08-01 before narrative finalization.

TargetName: DEL-09-02 Site Conditions and Due Diligence Summary
Statement: Site constraint details from DEL-09-02 (geotechnical/wetland/environmental/flood/grading) are required inputs for this narrative's site-specific construction approach and safety planning.
SourceRef: Specification.md > R-08 Coordination with Site Constraints
EvidenceQuote: Site constraints directly affect construction feasibility and risk. Demonstrating constraint awareness is essential for credibility.
Notes: FACT. Specification R-08 and Procedure.md Step 3 explicitly state site constraint details from DEL-09-02 are required inputs. Datasheet.md notes DEL-09-02 addresses detailed site conditions; this deliverable must integrate those constraints.

Statement: Utilities allowance approach described in this narrative must be consistent with allowance treatment in DEL-05-03; requires receipt of pricing assumptions before narrative utilities section can be finalized.
SourceRef: Specification.md > R-07 Site Services and Utilities Approach
EvidenceQuote: Allowance approach (if used) is stated and consistent with DEL-05-03 (Pricing Narrative and Assumptions).
Notes: FACT. Specification R-07 explicitly requires consistency with DEL-05-03. Procedure.md Step 3 requires Estimator review for consistency with pricing assumptions before narrative finalization.

TargetName: DEL-09-01 Risk Register and Mitigation Plan

Notes: FACT. Datasheet.md and Specification.md both explicitly state construction risks from this narrative feed DEL-09-01. Specification Out of Scope confirms risk register is DEL-09-01. Direction is DOWNSTREAM: this deliverable produces construction risk information consumed by DEL-09-01.

TargetName: DEL-04-02 Budget Control and Change Management Plan

Interface flows both ways but primary flow is from DEL-04-01 (methodology) to DEL-04-02 (cost/change integration); recorded as DOWNSTREAM from DEL-04-01's perspective.

Statement: Construction reporting cadence and stakeholder touchpoints in DEL-04-03 must align with and support the construction execution approach described in this narrative.

Notes: FACT. Datasheet.md explicitly states alignment requirement. Guidance.md Factor 3 explicitly states coordination with DEL-04-03 for public safety/stakeholder touchpoints. Recorded as DOWNSTREAM from DEL-04-01 (methodology drives communications structure).
